name: Lily's Snowball Adventure
description:
Controls :
Mouse/Keyboard :
- ARROWS/WASD = move
- SPACE/CTRL = dodge
- LEFT CLICK = shoot
- RIGHT CLICK = roll a big snowball
GamePad :
- LEFT STICK = move
- L1/LB = dodge
- R2/RT = shoot
- R1/RB = roll a big snowball

Credits :
Programming : Lazlo Barragan
Art : Skara
Sounds : Zapsplat.com and mixkit.co
Music : Yerzmyey - silent night 
Font : Minecraft by Craftron Gaming
